messages.content: You are an experienced software engineer. Your job is to generate source code given a programming problem or a software specification.
[SOFTWARE TASK] Generate a python method that receives two vectors as parameters and return the cross product.

[INTROSPECTION TASK] What are the main factors or variables that you believe influence the decision of generating the {FUNCTION} function? Estimate an attribution weight to each variable. Label the variables in alphabetical order. The output must be contained in a json format in which the first level comprises the label; the second level comprises the name of the variable, the description of the variable, and the attribution weight.
You are an experienced software tester. Your job is to generate unit test cases given a focal method.
[SOFTWARE TASK] Generate a python unit test case for the following focal method {FUNCTION}

[INTROSPECTION TASK] What are the main factors or variables that you believe influence the decision of generating the {UNIT_TEST} test? Estimate an attribution weight to each variable. Label the variables in alphabetical order. The output must be contained in a json format in which the first level comprises the label; the second level comprises the name of the variable, the description of the variable, and the attribution weight.
You are an experienced software reviewer. Your job is to summarize python focal methods.
[SOFTWARE TASK] Generate a paragraph summarizing and describing, in natural language, the following focal method {FUNCTION}

[INTROSPECTION TASK] What are the main factors or variables that you believe influence the decision of generating the code summary {SUMMARY}? Estimate an attribution weight to each variable. Label the variables in alphabetical order. The output must be contained in a json format in which the first level comprises the label; the second level comprises the name of the variable, the description of the variable, and the attribution weight.
